tool_description: We provide a solution to automate and optimize your routing and scheduling operations. Whether you deliver groceries, distribute compost bins, or pick up laundry — any Vehicle Routing Problem for that matter — we got your back.
name: Routific
title: Routific

api_list.name: Input Vehicle Routing Problem
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-routific.p.rapidapi.com/vrp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-routific.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
